ing: 1/2 pound processed cheese food (such as Velveeta Â®), cut into small chunks
n: Baked Apple Casserole with a Cheesy Twist
des: "A family tradition at any gathering. Can be served as a side, dessert, or sweet breakfast. Cooked to a golden brown, it's a cross between a casserole and a cobbler. Very easy, very simple."
ins:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Beat sugar and butter together in a bowl using and electric mixer until smooth and creamy; add flour. Beat mixture until just combined; fold in cheese until dough is evenly mixed.
Spread apples into a 9x13-inch baking dish. Spoon dough mixture over apples to evenly cover.
Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, 35 to 40 minutes.
